opinion.case_name: Gonzalez v. Crosby, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections

opinion:
544 U.S. 969

GONZALEZ
v.
CROSBY, SECRETARY, FLORIDA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS.

No. 04-6432.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 15, 2005.

1

C. A. 11th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 543 U.S. 1086.] Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
